attributes.action: Pay people all ages the same amount of money, as we all work equally!
attributes.background: People aged 18 have lots of responsibilities nowadays and it is not fair for them to be paid only £6.15 an hour. We all work the same amount of hours, it is not fair to be paid less. ALL AGES TO BE PAID THE SAME AMOUNT OF MONEY!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301749
